CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Status_changed_from_monitor_to_open__c ) ) , IF(Status_changed_from_monitor_to_open__c > Date_Monitor__c, Status_changed_from_monitor_to_open__c - Date_Monitor__c,Date_Monitor__c - Status_changed_from_monitor_to_open__c ) , IF(Date_Closed_Reference__c > Date_Monitor__c, Date_Closed_Reference__c - Date_Monitor__c, Date_Monitor__c - Date_Closed_Reference__c ) )
CustomField.label: SR Time in Monitor
